scripts.start: cd server && yarn start && cd ../client && yarn start
scripts.test: cd server && yarn test && cd ../client && yarn test
scripts.lint: eslint . && cd server && yarn lint && cd ../client && yarn lint
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --cache --fix && cd server && yarn lint:fix && cd ../client && yarn lint:fix
scripts.format: prettier --write . && cd server && yarn format && cd ../client && yarn format
scripts.format:check: prettier --check . && cd server && yarn format:check && cd ../client && yarn format:check
scripts.prepare: husky install && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit "npx lint-staged && cd client && npx lint-staged && cd ../server && npx lint-staged"
